body: The `THNN_(SpatialFullDilatedConvolution_shapeCheck)` call used to check that `weight` and `bias` are contiguous. So the `newContiguous` call here doesn't really matter. :)
body_html: The THNN_(SpatialFullDilatedConvolution_shapeCheck) call used to check that weight and bias are contiguous. So the newContiguous call here doesn't really matter. :)
body_text: The THNN_(SpatialFullDilatedConvolution_shapeCheck) call used to check that weight and bias are contiguous. So the newContiguous call here doesn't really matter. :)
